problems.description: You are given an unsorted array of numbers and a target element. Find if the target node occurs in the list using linear search and return the number of elements required to check
problems.inputs description: Input consists of an array of unsorted array - inp1 and the target element - inp2.
problems.expected description: list with first element - true if the target exists otherwise false and the second element - number of checks required

problems.description: You are given an unsorted array of numbers and a target element. Find if the target node occurs in the list using binary search(sort the list first) and return the number of elements required to check
problems.inputs description: Input consists of an array of unsorted array - inp1 and the target element - inp2.
problems.expected description: list with first element - true if the target exists otherwise false and the second element - number of checks required
